name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing high-performance applications utilizing **Python**, **Django**, and **AWS**. My comprehensive expertise includes CI/CD automation, ensuring efficient development workflows and robust deployment strategies. I am skilled in building APIs and have a strong understanding of architecture principles that support scalable and maintainable systems. Additionally, I am well-versed in automation strategies and observability practices to enhance application performance.
I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and finance sectors, integrating AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, I work with modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. My experience also includes a foundational knowledge of microservices architecture and managing event-driven systems to build secure applications in compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS.
